EmailTemplate.subject: New eBook: 3 Disruptive Payment Trends
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Platforming for a Digital WorldÂ GAIN THE AGILITY YOU NEED TO OWN THE FUTURE ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Transaction processing is a moving target.
In Fast-Changing Payments: 3 Disruptions that Demand Agility, we unpack three trends now driving an urgent need for agility across financial institutions, acquirers, processors and card networks alike.
The verdict? Only the nimble will survive. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
